Articles.Content:

This is not a rocket.

This is not a transport of any kind.

This is a giant firecracker string with three kerbals trapped in the top.

This is the Whipcord

yeah the problem is the physX engine is causing all the lag, have the same problem on a couple of my ships since the physX engine controls all the movements on the ship..
